did.abstract: An abridgement of Burchardus' description of the Holy Land, by an unknown author. Possibly a fragment of a larger manuscript held by the University of Ghent. Text in Latin. Codex Ms 707.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The manuscript is open for research.
